medipy.network.dicom¶

class medipy.network.dicom.Connection(host, port, calling_ae_title, called_ae_title)¶

A network connection from a SCU to a SCP.

host and port are peer informations at the TCP/IP level. calling_ae_title and called_ae_title are DICOM Application Entity titles, respectively for the SCU and the SCP.

connection = medipy.network.dicom.Connection(
    "pacs.example.com", 11112,
    "MY_MACHINE", "REMOTE_PACS")
class medipy.network.dicom.SSHTunnelConnection(host, remote_port, calling_ae_title, called_ae_title, username, password, local_port=None)¶

DICOM network connection through a SSH tunnel.

The tunnel is as follows :

(localhost, local_port) <-> (remote_host, 22) <-> (remote_host, remote_port)

Sujet précédent

medipy.itk.types

Sujet suivant

medipy.network.dicom.query
